00026 #include "lpc17xx_timer.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00038 uint8_t menu1[] =
00039 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00040 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00041 "Timer generate different frequencies demo \n\r"
00042 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00043 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00044 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00045 " Use timer 0 and timer 2 to generate 2 different frequency signals\n\r"
00046 " UART0 used to display and input frequency\n\r"
00047 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00048 
00049 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00050 void print_menu(void);

00054 /*********************************************************************/
00059 void print_menu(void)
00060 {
00061         _DBG(menu1);

00065 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00066 /*********************************************************************/
00071 int c_entry(void)
00072 {
00073         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00074         TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TIM_ConfigStruct;
00075         TIM_MATCHCFG_Type TIM_MatchConfigStruct;
00076         uint8_t idx;
00077         uint16_t tem;
00078         uint32_t freq1, freq2;
00079 
00080         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00081          * – 115200bps
00082          * – 8 data bit
00083          * – No parity
00084          * – 1 stop bit
00085          * – No flow control
00086          */
00087         debug_frmwrk_init();
00088 
00089         // print welcome screen
00090         print_menu();
00091         while(1)
00092         {
00093                 // Select frequency for channel1 (MAT0.0)
00094                 idx=0;freq1=0;tem=0;
00095                 while(idx<3)
00096                 {
00097                         if(idx==0)
00098                         _DBG("\n\rPlease input frequency for channel1 (from 1 to 999 hz):");
00099                         tem = _DG;
00100                         switch(tem)
00101                         {
00102                         case '0':case'1':case '2':case '3':case '4':case '5':case '6':case '7':case'8':case '9':
00103                                 tem = tem - 0x30;
00104                                 idx++;
00105                                 if(idx==1) tem = tem * 100;
00106                                 else if (idx==2) tem = tem * 10;
00107                                 freq1 = freq1 + tem;
00108                                 if(idx==3)_DBD16(freq1);
00109                                 tem = 0;
00110                                 break;
00111                         default:
00112                                 _DBG("...Please input digits from 0 to 9 only!");
00113                                 idx = 0; tem = 0; freq1 = 0;
00114                                 break;
00115                         }
00116                 }
00117                 idx=0;freq2=0;tem=0;
00118                 while(idx<3)
00119                 {
00120                         if(idx==0)
00121                         _DBG("\n\rPlease input frequency for channel2 (from 1 to 999 hz):");
00122                         tem = _DG;
00123                         switch(tem)
00124                         {
00125                         case '0':case'1':case '2':case '3':case '4':case '5':case '6':case '7':case'8':case '9':
00126                                 tem = tem - 0x30;
00127                                 idx++;
00128                                 if(idx==1) tem = tem * 100;
00129                                 else if (idx==2) tem = tem * 10;
00130                                 freq2 = freq2 + tem;
00131                                 if(idx==3)_DBD16(freq2);
00132                                 tem = 0;
00133                                 break;
00134                         default:
00135                                 _DBG("...Please input digits from 0 to 9 only!");
00136                                 idx = 0; tem = 0; freq2 = 0;
00137                                 break;
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140                 // Configure P1.28 as MAT0.0
00141                 PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00142                 PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00143                 PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00144                 PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00145                 PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00146                 PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00147                 // Configure P0.6 as MAT2.0
00148                 PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00149                 PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00150                 PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00151                 PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00152                 PinCfg.Pinnum = 6;
00153                 PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00154 
00155                 // Initialize timer, prescale count time of 1uS
00156                 TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00157                 TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleValue  = 1;
00158                 TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00159                 TIM_Init(LPC_TIM2, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00160 
00161                 // use channel 0, MR0
00162                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchChannel = 0;
00163                 // Disable interrupt when MR0 matches the value in TC register
00164                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.IntOnMatch   = FALSE;
00165                 //Enable reset on MR0: TIMER will reset if MR0 matches it
00166                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ResetOnMatch = TRUE;
00167                 //Stop on MR0 if MR0 matches it
00168                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.StopOnMatch  = FALSE;
00169                 //Toggle MR0.0 pin if MR0 matches it
00170                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ExtMatchOutputType =TIM_EXTMATCH_TOGGLE;
00171                 // Set Match value
00172                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchValue   = 500000/freq1;
00173                 TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM0,&TIM_MatchConfigStruct);
00174 
00175                 // Set Match value
00176                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchValue   = 500000/freq2;
00177                 TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM2,&TIM_MatchConfigStruct);
00178 
00179                 TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00180                 TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM2,ENABLE);
00181                 _DBG("\n\rGenerating two different frequency signals..");
00182                 _DBG("\n\rPress ESC if you want to terminate and choose other frequencies");
00183                 while(_DG!=27);
00184                 TIM_DeInit(LPC_TIM0);
00185                 TIM_DeInit(LPC_TIM2);
00186         }
00187         return (1);
00188 }
00189 
00190 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00191 int main (void)
00192 {
00193         return c_entry();
00194 }
